title: ‘I Have to Do it for Myself’: Crunch Time for Wout van Aert Ahead of Flanders-Roubaix Crucible
content:
Wednesday's Dwars door Vlaanderen is one more chance to blow out the cobwebs as pressure piles on injury-depleted Visma-Lease a Bike: 'I've done everything I can to get ready for the classics.'

Read the full article at ‘I Have to Do it for Myself’: Crunch Time for Wout van Aert Ahead of Flanders-Roubaix Crucible on Velo.
author: ahood
